languages.text: "Тьма, здесь повсюду тьма — зубастая, голодная, неправильная... Смотри куда ступаешь — неверный шаг, и ты в гибельном омуте".

traits.locale_text: "Тьма, здесь повсюду тьма — зубастая, голодная, неправильная... Смотри куда ступаешь — неверный шаг, и ты в гибельном омуте".

languages.text: "Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."
languages.original_text: "Тьма, здесь повсюду тьма — зубастая, голодная, неправильная... Смотри куда ступаешь — неверный шаг, и ты в гибельном омуте".

traits.locale_text: "Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."
"Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."
"Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."
"Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."
"Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."
"Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."
"Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."

languages.text: «Oscuridad... Hay oscuridad por todas partes, violenta, voraz... y nada es como debería ser... Vigile por dónde camina. Un paso en falso y esta perdición l{mf|e|a} devorará».
languages.original_text: "Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."

languages.text: 「暗闇が…どこにもそこにも闇があるの。牙をむき、飢えた闇が。そのすべてが間違ってる…足元には気を付けて。一歩間違えれば、この破滅に飲み込まれてしまうよ」
languages.original_text: "Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."

languages.text: “黑暗……这里到处都是黑暗，饥渴的黑暗择人而噬。这里的一切都不正常……当心脚下，稍有不慎，就会被灾祸吞噬。”
languages.original_text: "Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."

languages.text: "Dunkelheit ... Überall Dunkelheit, beißend und hungrig ... und alles ist verkehrt ... Seid vorsichtig. Ein falscher Schritt und dieses Verderben wird Euch verschlingen."
languages.original_text: "Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."

languages.text: « Les ténèbres… Elles sont partout, mordantes, affamées… Ce n'est pas normal… Attention où vous mettez les pieds. Un seul faux pas, et elles vous engloutiront. »
languages.original_text: "Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."
"Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."

languages.text: "Karanlık... Her yeri karanlık sarmış. Isırıyor, açlık çektiriyor ve... Hepsi yanlış. Adımını attığın yere dikkat et. Yanlış bir adımda tüm bu kıyametler seni yutacak."
languages.original_text: "Darkness... There is darkness everywhere, biting, hungering — and it's all wrong... Watch where you tread. One misstep, and this doom will swallow you."
